name: Sweet Potato, Corn and Jalapeño Bisque
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, quick, one pot, soups and stews
keywords: appetizer, main course, corn, sweet potato, fall, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 medium sweet potatoes (about 2 1/2 pounds total), peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 medium jalapeño, seeded and finely chopped
1 cup fresh or frozen corn kernels
Finely chopped scallions, green parts only

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan or soup pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and sauté until just soft, 2 to 3 minutes. Add sweet potatoes and stock and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are soft, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Using an immersion blender or a food processor, purée contents of pot, in batches if necessary, until smooth.
Reheat soup, stirring in jalapeño, corn, molasses, salt, cayenne, black pepper and cinnamon. Taste, adjust seasonings and serve, topped with scallions.
